TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProtocolImporter extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides common functionality across communication protocols for generating classes for Web services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter> class and its concrete derived classes generate client proxy code or abstract server code according to a specified communication protocol. <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter> provides common functionality regardless of the protocol. Within a given protocol, a concrete derived class generates a class for each supported binding defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. Typically, instead of directly invoking classes derived from <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter>, a developer uses these classes indirectly through the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the abstract XML schemas used by the associated instance.
Docs.value: The abstract XML schemas used by the associated instance

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddExtensionWarningComments(class System.CodeDom.CodeCommentStatementCollection comments, class System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection extensions) cil managed

Docs.param: A that specifies the collection of code comments to which each warning message is added.
A that specifies the extensions or XML elements for which warnings should be generated if they are not handled.
Docs.summary: For each unhandled extension or XML element in the input extensions collection, turns on a or warning for each unhandled extension or XML element in the input extensions collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method also adds the warning messages to a collection of code comments.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration BeginClass() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, initializes the generation of a binding class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When generating a class for a given binding, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter> class calls the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter.BeginClass%2A>method before generating methods that correspond to operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void BeginNamespace() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, performs namespace-wide initialization during code generation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When generating code, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter> class calls the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter.BeginNamespace%2A> method before generating classes that represent bindings.

Docs.summary: Gets the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) binding that the protocol importer is currently processing to generate a class.
Docs.value: The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) binding that the protocol importer is currently processing to generate a class.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the binding class that is currently being generated.
Docs.value: The name of the binding class that is currently being generated.

Docs.summary: Gets the object that generates a unique name for the binding class that is currently being generated.
Docs.value: The object that generates a unique name for the binding class that is currently being generated.

Docs.summary: Gets a representation of the .NET Framework namespace of the binding classes that are being generated.
Docs.value: A representation of the .NET Framework namespace of the binding classes that are being generated.

Docs.summary: Gets a representation of the binding class that is currently being generated.
Docs.value: A representation of the binding class that is currently being generated.

Docs.summary: Gets the concrete XML schemas used by the associated instance.
Docs.value: The concrete XML schemas used by the associated instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void EndClass() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, processes a binding class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When generating a class for a given binding, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter> class calls the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter.EndClass%2A> method after generating methods that correspond to operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void EndNamespace() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, performs processing for an entire namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When generating code, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter> class calls the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter.EndNamespace%2A> method after generating classes that represent bindings.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod GenerateMethod() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, generates method code for binding classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When generating code, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter> class calls the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter.GenerateMethod%2A> method for each binding class method that represents an operation.

Docs.summary: Gets the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) input message for the abstract operation that the protocol importer is currently processing to generate a method in a binding class.
Docs.value: The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) input message for the abstract operation that the protocol importer is currently processing to generate a method in a binding class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsBindingSupported() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, determines whether a class can be generated for the current binding.
Docs.returns: True if the binding is supported; otherwise false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When generating code, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter> class calls the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter.IsBindingSupported%2A> method to determine whether to generate a class for the current binding, as represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter.Binding%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsOperationFlowSupported(valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow flow) cil managed

Docs.param: An enumeration value that represents a transmission pattern.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, determines whether the current operation's operation flow is supported.
Docs.returns: True if the current operation's operation flow is supported.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When generating code, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter> class calls the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter.IsOperationFlowSupported%2A> method to determine whether to generate a method for the current operation, as represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter.Operation%2A> property. This evaluation takes place for each operation in a binding for which a class is being generated. If a `false` value is returned, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter> class calls its <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter.UnsupportedOperationWarning%2A> method.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessageCollection.Flow%2A> property. The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.Messages%2A> property is of type <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessageCollection>.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the binding class method which that the protocol importer is currently generating.
Docs.value: The name of the binding class method which that the protocol importer is currently generating.

Docs.summary: Gets the abstract Web Services Description Language (WSDL) operation that the protocol importer is currently processing to generate a method in a binding class.
Docs.value: The abstract Web Services Description Language (WSDL) operation that the protocol importer is currently processing to generate a method in a binding class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The operation appears as a child of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolImporter.PortType%2A> element in a WSDL document. The method is generated with a <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute> class.

Docs.summary: Gets the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) operation binding that the protocol importer is currently processing to generate a method in a binding class.
Docs.value: The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) operation binding that the protocol importer is currently processing to generate a method in a binding class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The method is generated with a <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Exception OperationBindingSyntaxException(string text) cil managed

Docs.param: Annotation to be added to the exception message, which already indicates that the operation binding syntax is invalid.
Docs.summary: Produces an **Exception** indicating that the current instance for which a binding class is being generated is invalid within the target namespace.
Docs.returns: An **Exception** indicating that the current instance for which a binding class is being generated is invalid within the target namespace.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Exception OperationSyntaxException(string text) cil managed

Docs.param: Annotation to be added to the exception message, which already indicates that the operation syntax is invalid.
Docs.summary: Produces an **Exception** indicating that the current instance for which a binding class is being generated is invalid within the target namespace.
Docs.returns: An **Exception** indicating that the current instance for which a binding class is being generated is invalid within the target namespace.

Docs.summary: Gets the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) output message for the abstract operation that the protocol importer is currently processing to generate a method in a binding class.
Docs.value: The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) output message for the abstract operation that the protocol importer is currently processing to generate a method in a binding class.

Docs.summary: Gets a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) port that contains a reference to the binding that the protocol importer is currently processing to generate a binding class. If more than one port refers to the current binding, the current port is the one in which the binding has most recently been found.
Docs.value: The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) port that contains a reference to the binding that the protocol importer is currently processing to generate a binding class. If more than one port refers to the current binding, the current port is the one in which the binding has most recently been found.

Docs.summary: Gets the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) that is implemented by the binding that the protocol importer is currently processing to generate a binding class.
Docs.value: The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) that is implemented by the binding that the protocol importer is currently processing to generate a binding class.

Docs.summary: Abstract property that concrete derived classes must implement to get the name of the protocol being used.
Docs.value: The name of the protocol being used.

Docs.summary: Gets all the XML schemas, both abstract and concrete, used by the associated instance.
Docs.value: The XML schemas, both abstract and concrete, used by the associated instance.

Docs.summary: Gets the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) service that contains a reference to the binding that the protocol importer is currently processing to generate a binding class.
Docs.value: The Web Services Description Language (WSDL) service that contains a reference to the binding that the protocol importer is currently processing to generate a binding class.

Docs.summary: Gets the objects that belong to the associated instance that are searched for bindings from which to generate binding classes.
Docs.value: The objects that belong to the associated instance that are searched for bindings from which to generate binding classes.

Docs.summary: Gets an enumeration value that indicates whether a client proxy class or an abstract server class is being generated. The values are **Client** and **Server**. The value is that of the associated instance's property.
Docs.value: An enumeration value that indicates whether a client proxy class or an abstract server class is being generated. The values are **Client** and **Server**. The value is that of the associated instance's property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnsupportedBindingWarning(string text) cil managed

Docs.param: Annotation to be added to the warning message, which already indicates that the binding has been ignored.
Docs.summary: Turns on an warning in the enumeration obtained through the property. This method also adds a warning message to the comments for the class that is being generated.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnsupportedOperationBindingWarning(string text) cil managed

Docs.param: Annotation to be added to the warning message, which already indicates that the operation binding has been ignored.
Docs.summary: Turns on an warning in the enumeration obtained through the property. This method also adds a warning message to the comments for the class that is being generated.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnsupportedOperationWarning(string text) cil managed

Docs.param: Annotation to be added to the warning message, which already indicates that the operation binding has been ignored.
Docs.summary: Turns on an warning in the enumeration obtained through the property. This method also adds a warning message to the comments for the class that is being generated.
Gets or sets a enumeration value that indicates the types of warnings, if any, issued by the protocol importer while generating binding classes.
Docs.value: A enumeration value that indicates the types of warnings, if any, issued by the protocol importer while generating binding classes.
